definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up

sentences.english: This pizza parlor offers free delivery on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 披萨店在工作日夜晚提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: The 1010 Central store even has its own signature fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 1010中环店甚至还有自己的独特香氛。

sentences.english: May I request a late check in?
sentences.chinese: 我想要求晚些到店进住，可以吗？

sentences.english: Have you checked out the new music store?
sentences.chinese: 你去逛过新开的唱片店了吗？

sentences.english: The vision sweeps to take intention in the store.

sentences.chinese: 欢迎到华星店亲自看一看。

sentences.english: Metrologic shop for computers and bar code scanners to read product reviews.
sentences.chinese: 店内码捷仪器硬件和条码扫描器读取商品评论。

sentences.english: Would you mind the store for me while I'm out?
sentences.chinese: 你能在我不在时帮我照看一下店吗？

sentences.english: Sauced meat shop:Intestines and tripe are the favorite food for the people in the south.
sentences.chinese: 卤味店》肠肚下水是南方人最喜欢的食物。

sentences.english: The restaurant was opened by college graduates from the local university.
sentences.chinese: 这家店的老板是杭州当地大学毕业的学生。

sentences.english: AYou can buy them at a souvenir shop near the exit.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在出口附近的纪念品店买到。

sentences.english: They got a Blacks down the corner, I think, as well.
sentences.chinese: 拐角处还有一个Blacks品牌店。

sentences.english: Over the last five years an independent record shop has closed in the UK every three days.
sentences.chinese: 英国在过去的五年里，每三天就会有一间唱片店关闭。

sentences.english: But serving a new sport means cutting back on his traditional surf stores.
sentences.chinese: 但是，为一项新的运动方式削减他的传统冲浪店。

sentences.english: Maizidian Xijie, Sanyuanqiao, Across from Xinhengji Tower on Women's Street.
sentences.chinese: 麦子店西街9号，三元桥，女人街新恒基大厦路口。

sentences.english: In a sign of the times, one carpentry shop now sells ready-made coffins.
sentences.chinese: 随着时代改变，有一家木材店现在也买现成的棺材。

definition: Xindian or Hsintien city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
